title: Failing Forward: Attitude Improvement Program for Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and understanding of experimental processes
context.additional_context: Primarily utilizing smartphone-based learning activities for office/administrative working students

learning_goals: Students can write reflective essays applying a growth mindset perspective by analyzing failure cases.
Learners enhance their ability to reinterpret failure as a learning opportunity through peer assessment activities.
Learners develop response strategies for errors occurring in the scientific experimental process using the predict-explain cycle model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
